name: Gift of Giving
description:
Made for the Yogscast Game Jam 2019

A small minigame I made within the span of about 20 hours. This is one of my first Gamemaker games, so any and all feedback is appreciated.

A simple "shooter" game in which you give presents to people who are trying to beat Santa up. A and D to move, W to jump, and left mouse button to throw presents.

Song: Snowball Fight by Dee Yan-Kee
